meanings.definition: An agreement made by a couple before they marry regarding the ownership of their respective assets in the event of divorce.
meanings.sent1: The couple signed prenuptials to decide how to split their things if they divorce.
meanings.sent2: She brought up prenuptials when discussing marriage with her partner.
meanings.sent3: Their prenuptials included who gets the dog if they split up.
meanings.sent4: The prenuptials acted as a safety net for their future.
meanings.sent5: The lawyer explained the importance of prenuptials in marriage.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving a prenuptial agreement.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer specialized in prenuptials cases.
meanings.sent2: They had a prenuptials discussion before the wedding.
meanings.sent3: Her prenuptials dress was elegant and simple.
meanings.sent4: The prenuptials meeting was brief but crucial.
meanings.sent5: He understood the significance of prenuptials agreements.
